name: LD37 - Zombie Room
description:
Zombie Room is a game made for the Ludum Dare Jam 37. In it, you're in a room that is constantly changing. Zombies will spawn, and your score goes up when you kill them with your pistol. One shot will kill them, but getting hit by them once will also kill you. Ammo is limited, but you can find more around the level.

Default Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Reload - R
  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Flashlight - F
  • Aim Gun - Move Mouse

UPDATE:

  • Fixed issue where movement was way too fast if the game was running really fast.
